links.title: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL): Apple Inc. (AAPL): PT Raised News | StockNews.com
links.description: Apple Inc. designs, manufactures, and markets mobile communication and media devices, personal computers, watches, and portable digital music players worldwide, including iPhone, iPad, Mac, iPod, Apple TV, and more. The company also sells related software, services, accessories, networking solutions, and third-party digital content and applications.

links.title: What Will Curb the S&P 500's Progress?: Rate Hike, QT, Trade, Trends - Finom Group
links.description: Despite the noise surrounding global trade and correlated tariffs last week, the S&P 500 finished higher by nearly 1 percent. Additionally, the S&P 500 YTD gain stands at roughly 7.6 percent after correcting nearly 12% in February. Heading into September, the S&P 500 is up 5 consecutive months and with two consecutive monthly >3% gains.

links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Betting Big on A.R. Glasses
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has its sights set on the augmented reality glasses market, and the company has just taken a big step towards bolstering its efforts. The company has acquired a start-up that makes lenses for the glasses themselves. CNBC has the news on Apple's acquisition.
